pages.text: $(br) Hostile entities will ignore you. $(br) To use this power, you must right-click while looking at the entity.$(br)$(br)$(br) Bonus: $(br) - You have a chance to tame pets.

pages.title: Interactions
pages.text: $(br) + Duralumin: Stops and debilitates the entity. $(br2) + Lerasium: Apply the effect in area. $(br2) + Both: Stops and weakens entities in the area.
